Usage: $0 remote run <platform>

Description:

  Builds and installs your application for a specific platform.

  See the 'build' and 'install' commands for available [options].

Options:

  --protocol           server protocol (default: 'https:')
  --host               server host (default: 'build.phonegap.com')
  --port               server port (default: '443')
  --path               server path prefix (default: '/api/v1')
  --proxy              proxy server to route requests

Examples:

  $ $0 remote run android
